verses.roman:
manus trayodaśo bhāvyo
deva-sāvarṇir ātmavān
citrasena-vicitrādyā
deva-sāvarṇi-dehajāḥ

synonyms: manuḥ—the Manu; trayodaśaḥ—thirteenth; bhāvyaḥ—will become; deva-sāvarṇiḥ—Deva-sāvarṇi; ātmavān—well advanced in spiritual knowledge; citrasena—Citrasena; vicitra-ādyāḥ—and others, like Vicitra; deva-sāvarṇi—of Deva-sāvarṇi; deha-jāḥ—sons.
translation: The thirteenth Manu will be named Deva-sāvarṇi, and he will be very advanced in spiritual knowledge. Among his sons will be Citrasena and Vicitra.
